tika-s0403t2:2_1: Tatiyassa paṭhame ābhisamācārikanti abhisamācāre uttamasamācāre bhavaṁ.
tika-s0403t2:5_1: Tatiye na ca pabhāvantanti na ca pabhāsampannaṁ.
tika-s0403t2:5_7: Uppajjituṁ appadānenāti ettha nanu lokiyakusalacittassapi suvisuddhassapi uppajjituṁ appadāneneva upakkilesatāti?
tika-s0403t2:5_12: Parittakusalaṁ pana yathāpaccayaṁ uppajjamānaṁ nīvaraṇehi upahate santāne uppattiyā aparisuddhaṁ hontaṁ
tika-s0403t2:5_14: Apica nippariyāyato uppajjituṁ appadāneneva tesaṁ upakkilesatāti dassento “yadaggena hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0403t2:8_1: Pañcame sammādiṭṭhīti vipassanāsammādiṭṭhītiādinā aṅguttarabhāṇakānaṁ matena ayaṁ atthavaṇṇanā āraddhā,
tika-s0403t2:9_2: Phalakkhaṇe nibbattā cetovimutti phalaṁ assāti cetovimuttiphalā.
tika-s0403t2:9_3: Tadeva cetovimuttisaṅkhātaṁ phalaṁ ānisaṁso assāti cetovimuttiphalānisaṁsā.
tika-s0403t2:9_14: kammaṭṭhāne khalanapakkhalanaṁ chindantassa vipassanāpādikāsu aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu kammaṁ karontassa,
tika-s0403t2:9_15: sattavidhaṁ anupassanaṁ bhāventassa arahattamaggo uppajjitvā phalaṁ deti.
tika-s0403t2:10_0: “Yathā hi madhuraṁ ambapakkaṁ paribhuñjitukāmo ambapotakassa samantā udakakoṭṭhakaṁ thiraṁ katvā bandhati,
tika-s0403t2:10_1: ghaṭaṁ gahetvā kālena kālaṁ udakaṁ āsiñcati,
tika-s0403t2:10_3: Yā hoti samīpe valli vā sukkhadaṇḍako vā kipillikapuṭo vā makkaṭakajālaṁ vā,
tika-s0403t2:10_5: khaṇittiṁ gahetvā kālena kālaṁ mūlāni parikhaṇati,
tika-s0403t2:10_6: evamassa appamattassa imāni pañca kāraṇāni karoto so ambo vaḍḍhitvā phalaṁ deti,
tika-s0403t2:10_8: Rukkhassa samantato koṭṭhakabandhanaṁ viya hi sīlaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ,
tika-s0403t2:10_11: samīpe valliādīnaṁ haraṇaṁ viya kammaṭṭhāne khalanapakkhalanacchedanaṁ,
tika-s0403t2:10_12: kālena kālaṁ khaṇittiṁ gahetvā mūlakhaṇanaṁ viya sattannaṁ anupassanānaṁ bhāvanā,
tika-s0403t2:10_13: tehi pañcahi kāraṇehi anuggahitassa ambarukkhassa madhuraphaladānakālo viya imassa bhikkhuno imehi pañcahi
tika-s0403t2:11_0: Ettha ca laddhūpakārāti yathārahaṁ nissayādivasena laddhapaccayā.
tika-s0403t2:11_1: Vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiyā anuggahitabhāvena gahitattā maggasammādiṭṭhīsu ca arahattamaggasammādiṭṭhi.
tika-s0403t2:11_3: aggaphalasamādhimhi tapparikkhāradhammesuyeva ca kevalo cetopariyāyo niruḷhoti sammādiṭṭhīti arahattamaggasammādiṭṭhi.
tika-s0403t2:11_4: Phalakkhaṇeti anantaraṁ kālantare cāti duvidhepi phalakkhaṇe.
tika-s0403t2:11_9: Sabbakilesehi cetaso vimuccanasaṅkhātaṁ paṭippassambhanasaññitaṁ pahānaṁ phalaṁ ānisaṁso cāti yojanā.
tika-s0403t2:11_12: Aññathā phaladhammā eva ānisaṁsoti gayhamāne punavacanaṁ niratthakaṁ siyā.
tika-s0403t2:11_17: Sammāsatisammāvāyāmā pana samādhipakkhiyā evāti āha “avasesā dhammā cetovimuttīti veditabbā”ti.
tika-s0403t2:12_5: Tassa kammaṭṭhānassa ekavāraṁ vidhiyā appaṭipajjanaṁ khalanaṁ,
tika-s0403t2:12_8: Pūrentassāti vivaṭṭasannissitaṁ katvā pālentassa brūhentassa ca.
tika-s0403t2:13_1: Thiraṁ katvā bandhatīti asithilaṁ daḷhaṁ nātimahantaṁ nātikhuddakaṁ katvā yojeti.
tika-s0403t2:13_2: Thiraṁ karotīti udakasiñcanakāle tato tato pavattitvā udakassa anikkhamanatthaṁ jalāvāṭapāḷiṁ thirataraṁ karoti.
tika-s0403t2:13_6: Koṭṭhakabandhanaṁ viya sīlaṁ sammādiṭṭhiyā vaḍḍhanūpāyassa mūlabhāvato.
tika-s0403t2:13_8: Mariyādāya thirabhāvakaraṇaṁ viya samatho yathāvuttāya bhāvanādhiṭṭhānāya sīlamariyādāya daḷhībhāvāpādanato.
tika-s0403t2:13_10: Samīpe valliādīnaṁ haraṇaṁ viya kammaṭṭhāne khalanapakkhalanacchedanaṁ icchitabbabhāvanāya vibandhanāpanayanato.
tika-s0403t2:13_11: Mūlakhaṇanaṁ viya sattannaṁ anupassanānaṁ bhāvanā tassā vibandhassa mūlabhūtānaṁ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīnaṁ palikhaṇanato.
tika-s0403t2:13_12: Ettha ca yasmā suparisuddhasīlassa kammaṭṭhānaṁ anuyuñjantassa sappāyadhammassavanaṁ icchitabbaṁ,
tika-s0403t2:13_16: paripuṇṇā vipassanā maggasammādiṭṭhiṁ brūhetīti evametesaṁ aṅgānaṁ paramparāya sammukhā anuggaṇhanato ayamānupubbī kathitāti veditabbaṁ.
tika-s0403t2:16_1: Chaṭṭhe vimuttiyā vaṭṭadukkhato vimuccanassa āyatanāni kāraṇāni vimuttāyatanānīti āha –
tika-s0403t2:16_6: Pāḷiṁ jānantassāti tadatthabodhiniṁ pāḷiṁ yāthāvato upadhārentassa.
tika-s0403t2:16_9: Yathādesitaṁ dhammaṁ upadhārentassa tadanucchavikameva attano kāyavācāmanosamācāraṁ pariggaṇhantassa
tika-s0403t2:16_11: Tuṭṭhākārabhūtā balavapītīti purimuppannāya pītiyā vasena laddhāsevanattā ativiya tuṭṭhākārabhūtā kāyacittadarathassa
tika-s0403t2:16_12: passambhanasamatthatāya passaddhiyā paccayo bhavituṁ samatthā balappattā pīti jāyati.
tika-s0403t2:16_13: Yasmā nāmakāye passaddhe rūpakāyopi passaddho eva hoti,
tika-s0403t2:17_0: Sukhaṁpaṭilabhatīti vakkhamānassa cittasamādhānassa paccayo bhavituṁ samatthaṁ cetasikaṁ nirāmisasukhaṁ paṭilabhati vindati.
tika-s0403t2:17_1: Samādhiyatīti ettha pana na yo koci samādhi adhippeto,
tika-s0403t2:17_4: “Ayaṁ hī”tiādi tassaṁ desanāyaṁ tādisassa puggalassa yathāvuttasamādhipaṭilābhassa kāraṇabhāvavibhāvanaṁ,
tika-s0403t2:17_7: Samādhiyeva samādhinimittanti kammaṭṭhānapāḷiyā āruḷho samādhi eva parato uppajjanakabhāvanāsamādhissa kāraṇabhāvato samādhinimittaṁ.
tika-s0403t2:20_1: Sattame sabbaso kilesadukkhadarathapariḷāhānaṁ vigatattā sātisayamettha sukhanti vuttaṁ “appitappitakkhaṇe sukhattā paccuppannasukho”ti.
tika-s0403t2:20_2: Purimassa purimassa vasena pacchimaṁ pacchimaṁ laddhāsevanatāya santapaṇītatarabhāvappattaṁ hotīti āha “purimo…pe…
tika-s0403t2:20_9: Imassa pana arahattasamādhissa paṭippassaddhasabbakilesattā na niggahetabbaṁ vāretabbañca atthīti maggānantaraṁ
tika-s0403t2:20_10: samāpattikkhaṇe ca appayogena adhigatattā appitattā ca aparihānivasena vā appitattā na sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato.
tika-s0403t2:20_11: Sativepullappattattāti etena appavattamānāyapi satiyā satibahulatāya sato eva nāmāti dasseti.
tika-s0403t2:23_1: Aṭṭhame karo vuccati pupphasambhavaṁ “gabbhāsaye kirīyatī”ti katvā.
tika-s0403t2:23_5: “abhisandetī”tiādivacanato pana rūpakāyo idha adhippetoti āha “imaṁ karajakāya”nti.
tika-s0403t2:23_7: Taṁ pana abhisandanaṁ jhānamayena pītisukhena karajakāyassa tintabhāvāpādanaṁ sabbatthakameva lūkhabhāvāpanayananti āha “temetī”tiādi.
tika-s0403t2:23_8: Tayidaṁ abhisandanaṁ atthato yathāvuttapītisukhasamuṭṭhānehi paṇītarūpehi kāyassa parippharaṇaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-s0403t2:23_12: Avayavāvayavisambandhe avayavini sāmivacananti avayavavisayo sabba- saddo,
tika-s0403t2:23_14: Aphuṭaṁ nāma na hoti yattha yattha kammajarūpaṁ,
tika-s0403t2:24_1: Taṁ panassa kosallaṁ nahānīyacuṇṇānaṁ karaṇe piṇḍikaraṇe ca samatthatāvasena veditabbanti āha “paṭibalo”tiādi. Kaṁsa-
tika-s0403t2:24_2: saddo “mahatiyā kaṁsapātiyā”tiādīsu suvaṇṇe āgato.“Kaṁso upahato yathā”tiādīsu kittimalohe.
tika-s0403t2:24_5: Idha pana yattha katthaci loheti āha “yena kenaci lohena katabhājane”ti.
tika-s0403t2:24_7: Snehaparetāti udakasinehena parito gatā samantato phuṭā.
tika-s0403t2:24_10: Na ca pagghariṇīti etena tintassapi tassa ghanathaddhabhāvaṁ vadati.
tika-s0403t2:26_9: Yāva aggā yāva ca mūlā udakena abhisandanādisambhavadassanatthaṁ udakānuggataggahaṇaṁ.
tika-s0403t2:27_3: Yasmā pana pārisuddhiyā eva paccayavisesena pavattiviseso pariyodātatā sudhantasuvaṇṇassa nighaṁsanena pabhassaratā viya,
tika-s0403t2:27_10: Vatthaṁ viya karajakāyoti yogino karajakāyo vatthaṁ viya daṭṭhabbo utupharaṇasadisena catutthajjhānasukhena pharitabbattā.
tika-s0403t2:27_11: Purisassa sarīraṁ viya catutthajjhānaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ utupharaṇaṭṭhāniyassa sukhassa nissayabhāvato.
tika-s0403t2:27_13: Tattha ca “parisuddhena cetasā”ti cetogahaṇena jhānasukhaṁ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-s0403t2:28_0: Tassa tassa samādhissa sarūpadassanassa paccayattā paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṁ paccavekkhaṇanimittaṁ.
tika-s0403t2:29_1: Yattha salilasiñcanena vināva sassāni ṭhitāni sampajjanti.
tika-s0403t2:29_4: Tesaṁ sikkhāpanato hatthiādayopi “yoggā”ti vuccantīti āha pāḷiyaṁ “assadammasārathī”ti.
tika-s0403t2:29_5: Yena yenāti catūsu maggesu yena yena maggena.
tika-s0403t2:29_6: Yaṁ yaṁ gatinti javasamajavādibhedāsu gatīsu yaṁ yaṁ gatiṁ.
tika-s0403t2:32_1: Dasame uccāsaddamahāsaddāti uddhaṁ uggatattā ucco patthaṭo mahanto vinibbhijjitvā gahetuṁ asakkuṇeyyo saddo etesanti uccāsaddamahāsaddā.
tika-s0403t2:32_2: Vacīghosopi hi bahūhi ekajjhaṁ pavattito atthato saddato ca duravabodho kevalaṁ mahānigghoso eva hutvā sotapathamāgacchati.
tika-s0403t2:32_5: Kevaṭṭānañhi macchapacchiṭhapitaṭṭhāne mahājano sannipatitvā “idha aññaṁ ekaṁ macchaṁ dehi,
tika-s0403t2:32_8: mayhaṁ khuddako”ti evaṁ uccāsaddaṁ mahāsaddaṁ karonti.
tika-s0403t2:32_9: Macchaggahaṇatthaṁ jāle pakkhittepi tasmiṁ ṭhāne kevaṭṭā ceva aññe ca “paviṭṭho gahito”ti mahāsaddaṁ karonti.
tika-s0403t2:32_13: Pavivekasukhassāti gaṇasaṅgaṇikato kilesasaṅgaṇikato ca vigatassa sukhassa.
